title: Carson Wentz, Aaron Rodgers, Lamar Jackson, & Todd Gurley
itunes:title: Carson Wentz, Aaron Rodgers, Lamar Jackson, & Todd Gurley
description:
Colin explains why believing Nick Foles is better than Carson Wentz is ridiculous, why Aaron Rodgers can't use a certain excuse if the Packers lose this week, why he compares Lamar Jackson to Bitcoin, and his thoughts on Todd Gurley being frustrated. Guests include Nick Wright, Joel Klatt, Tilman Fertitta, and Bucky Brooks. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
